name: Majong Classic - Riichi Puzzle
description:
Majong Classic - Riichi Puzzle is the Japanese version of majong for 4 players.

√ STRATEGY GAME FOR 4 PLAYERS
Compete with 3 computer players.

√ TRAIN YOUR SKILLS
However, the majong also involves a degree of chance.

√ EARN MORE POINTS THAN THE OTHER PLAYERS
It's the main goal of the game according to the riichi version rules.
In the beginning, each player gets 25,000 points.

√ WIN INDIVIDUAL DEALINGS
The main way to get points. You need to collect 4 sets of 3 tiles and a pair.
A set consists of any 3 identical tiles or 3 tiles of the same suit one after another.

√ BECOME THE WINNER
Declaring the victory, the player opens his combination and calculates its value.
